com.box.boxjavalibv2.authorization

Class OAuthDataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.box.boxjavalibv2.authorization.OAuthDataController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuthDataController

    public class OAuthDataController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAuthDataController
    This is the data controller for OAuth, it handles token auto refresh.

      • setAutoRefreshOAuth

        public void setAutoRefreshOAuth(boolean autoRefresh)
        Makes OAuth auto refresh itself when token expires. Note if autorefresh fails, it's not going to try refresh again.
        Parameters:
        autoRefresh -
